title: Marketing Ops Specialist
job_overview:
Pod: Marketing Execution
Reports To: Marketing Ops Lead
Type: 1.0 FTE (8 hours/day)
Location: Remote
Core Hours: Must be available for 3+ hours overlap with 8am–12pm CST
Compensation: $650 per month  (month 1 + 2), then $750 per month from month 3 

About the Role
We're looking for a systems-oriented Marketing Ops Specialist who can translate strategy into action. You'll manage campaign execution, build marketing workflows, troubleshoot performance gaps, and serve as the connective tissue across platforms, channels, and analytics.

Key Responsibilities
Execution & Optimization
- Launch and monitor Google Ads, LinkedIn, Meta campaigns
- Implement SEO suggestions and web optimizations with developers
- Build automations in ActiveCampaign, HubSpot, Zapier, Make, or N8N

Cross-Team Collaboration
- Support strategy and design pods to execute integrated campaigns
- Build SOPs and collaborate on playbooks to streamline execution

Reporting & Performance
- Maintain GA4, Looker Studio, and attribution dashboards
- Analyze CPL, CAC, MQLs and recommend optimizations

Who You Are
- 3–5 years of experience in hands-on marketing execution
- Fluent in marketing platforms, CRM systems, dashboards, and automation tools
- Strategic doer with an eye for details and repeatable systems

What You Won’t Be Doing
- Writing blog content or designing creative assets
- Leading client strategy (you support it)

Why This Role Stands Out
- Hands-on ownership of technical marketing systems
- Strategic pod model—you're not a task-taker
- Remote-first, async-friendly, long-term team environment

How to Apply
- Send resume or LinkedIn
- Share examples of a campaign or workflow you built and improved
